UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Symbiotic NCR Peptide Fragments Affect the Viability, Morphology and Biofilm Formation of Candida Species.
Literature.Author: Szerencsés B, Gácser A, Endre G, Domonkos I, Tiricz H, Vágvolgyi C, Szolomajer J, Howan DHO, Tóth GK, Pfeiffer I, Kondorosi É

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:20% Cell death=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans SZMC 1458(MIC=12.5µM),Candida auris 0381(no activity data),Candida glabrata CBS 138(MIC=25µM),Candida parapsilosis CBS 604(MIC=12.5µM),Candida tropicalis CBS 94(MIC=3.12µM)
